message: There are documents at my office which have Custom Properties to be edited. Are there any libs for Python to allow to manipulate those properties?
You can always do it over COM, though that has to be run on a Windows machine with Word installed.
You might want to look at https://github.com/mikemaccana/python-docx , http://www.scribd.com/doc/27135827/Python-Docx (I haven't used it myself)
